title: Matt Ryan traded to Indy; Can Colts dethrone Titans? 28-3 narrative; Kenny Pickett's hand size; Mike Singletary
itunes:title: Matt Ryan traded to Indy; Can Colts dethrone Titans? 28-3 narrative; Kenny Pickett's hand size; Mike Singletary
description:
The latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast examines how much value Matt Ryan will bring to the Indianapolis Colts following his trade from the Atlanta Falcons.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Tom Pelissero, and former Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew look at how the Matt Ryan led Indianapolis Colts matchup against the Tennessee Titans in the AFC South. Then they share their thoughts on how much of a big deal Kenny Pickett’s hand size is; Tom Pelissero shares how these past two weeks have been the craziest stretch of his career; Kyle Brandt explains why he wants the Matt Ryan 28-3 narrative to end; and MJD provides insight on how future draftees should enter their pro day. They finish up being joined by Mike Singletary and he shares stories about Walter Payton and then he explains why the 85’ Chicago Bears have stood the test of time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
